EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber}: Proof of Use - DuPont Trademark Proper Usage: {!Case.Customer_Lab_Result__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Company__c}:
We have noticed your use of the DuPont™ {!Case.Product_Selected__c} trademark in association with the above site(s) to _____________ which is not authorized by DuPont. {!Case.Product_Selected__c} is a registered trademark of
E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company (“DuPont”) covering _____________ and may only be used with the authorization of the owner. DuPont has invested a substantial amount of effort and financial resources in advertising and promoting its trademarks in order to establish them as symbols of our company’s high quality products. We are sure you will agree with us that trademarks are valuable properties deserving protection. Use of our registered trademark may only be made in connection to goods made with DuPont {!Case.Product_Selected__c} as approved or licensed by DuPont or to resell DuPont licensed goods especially if they are for consumer safety compliance.
A review of our records does not indicate any sales of DuPont™ {!Case.Product_Selected__c} to your company. Perhaps your company purchases from one of our channel partners. We ask that you confirm your genuine source of supply by providing a certification letter from your supplier(s) (copy of invoice or a letter, for example) that you are purchasing and using DuPont™ {!Case.Product_Selected__c}. Without proof of such certification confirming the purchase of authentic DuPont {!Case.Product_Selected__c}, we will need to ask you to cease using the {!Case.Product_Selected__c} trademarks in all media, labels, packaging available.
Actions Required:
DuPont views the infringement of our intellectual property assets as a serious matter. We, thereby, look forward to a speedy and amicable resolution of this issue with this infringement notice. We, therefore, require you to take the following actions:
1. Provide us with documents confirming that the materials you are indicating as consisting of DuPont™ {!Case.Product_Selected__c} are genuine DuPont sourced.
2. If this is not provided then we require you to: - Remove all references to the DuPont™ {!Case.Product_Selected__c} trademark from your website or any other website operated by you.
- Ce- Cease all unauthorized use of the {!Case.Product_Selected__c} trademark in all media including packaging, labels, brochures, packaging, leaflets, advertising, etc. to avoid infringements and/or counterfeit relevant goods.
3. If the source revealed is a DuPont customer, we’ll request proper revisions needed of our DuPont trademarks as applicable.
We would expect the above steps to be taken within the next fourteen (14) days. Changes to printed materials such as catalogs, brochures, may be made at the next printing.
Confirmation of Compliance:
We ask that you indicate your willingness to comply with our requests above by initialing and countersigning this letter and e-mailing or mailing it back to our attention within 7 days of receipt. You may also print and fax this letter back to us at 302-380-3509.
Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.
Sincerely,
DuPont Brand Protection Center
